title: China and Armageddon - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/11/19
itunes:title: China and Armageddon - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/11/19
description:
George Noory and researcher Richard Austin explore his work deciphering the Book of Revelation from the Bible, and the evidence he has found that China is working towards global technological dominance to push for World War 3.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
